episode.title: 廃部
Disband!
Haibu
episode.summary: Aichi Sendou and friends from the Miyaji Academy CF Club look forward to participating in the Vanguard Koshien. However, with a lack of members in the club, the student council sends them a notice to disband. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: コーチはアイチ!?
Aichi`s the Coach!?
Coach wa Aichi!?
episode.summary: The CF Club challenges the student council for the club`s survival. As the student council doesn`t seem to improve in their fights at all, Aichi decides to become their coach. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 異世界転生した邪眼の王子は, 最強勇者と愛を謳う
Evil-Eyed Prince from Another World Sings of the Strongest Hero and Love
Isekai Tensei Shita Jagan no Ouji wa, Saikyou Yuusha to Ai o Utau
episode.summary: The fight between CF Club and the student council begins. What are the hidden feelings of the Maki Nagashiro, secretary, towards Naoki? Will the fearsome ability of Eru Nakagami from the paranormal power research society bear its fangs against Shingo again? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: グローバルを超えろ!!
Beyond Globalization!!
Global o Koero!!
episode.summary: It`s the final battle of the challenge. With his way with words, Tatewaki Naitou, the student council president, makes Aichi his advisor. Can Misaki overcome the odds and save the club against such powerful adversaries? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新章突入事前特番 カードファイト!! ヴァンガー道
Episode S1
Shinshou Totsunyuu Jizen Bangumi: Cardfight!! Vanguard
失われたイメージ
Lost Imagination
Ushinawareta Image
episode.summary: Some fighters are tormented by mysterious disorders. Kamui brings Kyou to visit Voyage, where he encounters Rekka. Meanwhile, Tetsu chases after Kyou, and Kai meets Koutei again. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: はじまりのジ・エンド
The Beginning of The End
Hajimari no the End
episode.summary: What awaits Kai at Voyage is none other than Mamoru Anjou, with a new Overlord card in hand. Overcoming countless defeats, Kai recalls his first encounter with Overlord. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: グレイヲンの囁き
Greion`s Whisper
Greiwon no Sasayaki
episode.summary: Ibuki loses the peace gained from the battle with the Wandering Star Brandt, and is overcome with guilt. Ibuki receives an invitation to the Tatsunagi Mansion, where he is met by Nome Tatsunagi, the new head of the Tatsunagi foundation. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: The... ラスト・デリートエンド
The Last Delete End
The... Last Delete End
episode.summary: Ibuki`s heart rejects the power of Deletors out of fear. Discarding his deck, Ibuki decides to quit Vanguard for good. However, he is stopped by Leon, who coincidentally paid a visit to the Tatsunagi Mansion. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 王者の決意
Ruler`s Resolution
Ouja no Ketsui
episode.summary: To make up for his own sins with the new power he obtained, Ibuki appears before the person he had deleted, Tetsu. He then challenges Asaka to a fight, to join the Fukuhara High School VG Club`s Koshien team as the anchor. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スタンドアップ!! ヴァンガード甲子園!!
Stand Up!! Vanguard Koshien!!
Stand Up!! Vanguard Koushien!!
episode.summary: The four schools advancing to the Vanguard Koshien semifinals have been decided, and they are Miyaji, Hitsue, Fukuhara, and Harumi. And the first match is Fukuhara VS Harumi. With their reputation on the line, which high school will proceed to the finals? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: おかえり, 櫂
Welcome Back, Kai
Okaeri, Kai
episode.summary: The next semifinals is Miyaji VS Hitsue. However, Kai goes missing on the day of the fight. Without completely recovering from being deleted, will Kai make it in time to the venue? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 過去でも未来でもない記憶
Memories Neither from the Past Nor Future
Kako demo Mirai demo Nai Kioku
episode.summary: The finals is Miyaji VS Fukuhara. Leaving the anchor match to Naoki, Aichi and Ren face off in the fourth match. As Ren goes all out to enjoy the fight, his PSYqualia reveals a destiny that should`ve been lost. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決着!!
Decisive Fight!!
Kecchaku!!
episode.summary: Vanguard Koshien has Naoki and Ibuki facing off for the anchor match! It`s a fight that will decide the victor. As things heat up for Naoki, he catches a glimpse of Kourin. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ようこそ, カードファイト部へ
Welcome to the CF Club
Youkoso, Cardfight Bu e
episode.summary: No matter the distance, the souls led by fate cross paths once more. Kourin invites Miyaji Academy, the winner of Vanguard Koshien, to an exhibition match. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オレが店長だ!!
I`m the Manager!!
Ore ga Tenshou Da!!
episode.summary: Shinemon Nitta is the self-proclaimed manager of Card Capital. Shinemon works hard to protect Card Capital from the director of a large-scale card shop, Esuka Hibino. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エスカへようこそ!!
Welcome to Esuka!!
Eska e Youkoso!!
episode.summary: In the struggle for the right to run Card Capital, Shinemon has his own deck taken away. Shinemon and Mark infiltrate Esuka`s main shop to try to get it back. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヴァンガー道 真夏の課外授業SP!
Episode S2
VanGuarDou: Manatsu no Kagaijugyou SP!
はじめてのお留守番
First Time Holding the Fort
Hajimete no Orusuban
episode.summary: Leaving Card Capital to his disciple Tatsuya, Shinemon challenges the re-test. However, Esuka`s hitmen, Nanami and Tonori, appeared, and they seem to have taken away Mikuru...... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アイドル誕生?
Idol`s Birth?
Idol Tanjou?
episode.summary: The one who summoned Mikuru is Esuka. Esuka proposes that Mikuru debut as an idol. Meanwhile, Mark and Tatsuya enter Esuka`s main shop to rescue Mikuru. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: トークン対決!! プラントvs妖魔変幻[イビルデコイ]!!
Token Fight!! Plant VS Evil Decoy!!
Tokkun Taiketsu!! Plant vs Evil Decoy!!
episode.summary: The curtain rises on the fight between the strongest S ranked fighter Nanami, and the Ninja Master. As the fight rages between those two, Shinemon gets tormented by the sub-manager......!? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 土壇場のノーガード!!
Last Ditch No Guard!!
Dotanba no No Guard!!
episode.summary: Shinemon arrives at Esuka`s main shop and faces off against Nanami. The secret of Nanami`s cold attitude towards the fight is hidden within her encounters with both Vanguard and Esuka. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キャピタル復活!!
Capital Revived!!
Capital Fukkatsu!!
episode.summary: Card Capital will open for a day for the shopping street`s Halloween festival. Shinemon and friends try to revive the fun atmosphere from the past, but an unexpected trouble occurs...... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キャピタルへようこそ!!
Welcome to Capital!!
Capital e Youkoso!!
episode.summary: It`s the day of the Halloween festival. The tournament runs smoothly, but Shinemon is bogged down with work as the manager. Then, Rive goes missing. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヴァルケリオンの涙
Valkerion`s Tears
Valkyrion no Namida
episode.summary: Esuka appears as Card Capital`s one day open ends without a hitch. Esuka proposes a cardfight to Shinemon with the rights to run Card Capital on the line. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 明日なき新右衛門
End of Shinemon
Ashita Naki Shinemon
episode.summary: On top of losing to Esuka and getting chased out of Card Capital, Shinemon sees Misaki together with Esuka, and falls into despair. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新・新・新右衛門?
Shin, Shin, Shinemon?
Shin Shin Shinemon?
episode.summary: With his sights set on a rematch with Esuka and to battle in the S Cup, Shinemon wanders in his attempt to change. Meanwhile, Esuka invites powerful fighters from all around the world.01:48, 11:01, 22:14 Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チーム竜牙独尊!!
Team Dragon`s Vanity!!
Team Ryuu Kiba Dokuson!!
episode.summary: The Esu Cup is where the rematch with Esuka will occur! However, Team Dragon`s Vanity, formed with 3 esteemed fighters from various regions, stand before Shinemon and friends. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エスカップ決勝
Esu Cup Match
ESCAP Kesshou
episode.summary: The match between Team Capital and Team Dragon`s Vanity will be decided when either side gets 3 wins! The first fight was entrusted to Ninja Master, but he seems to be fooled by the Oyama`s flashy style. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カードか人生か
Card or Life
Card ka Jinsei ka
episode.summary: Rive is chosen by Ruga to be his opponent. Though these two used to fight side by side as a pair, Ruga scolds Rive for running away from his fear of fighting against Ruga. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: イメージを塗りかえろ!!
Image Transformed!!
Image o Nurikaero!!
episode.summary: Shinemon faces the last hurdle of Dragon`s Vanity, which was none other than he who sheds tears upon the sin of weakness, Yuichirou Kanzaki. Will he be able to overcome Kanzaki in this last fight? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神々の実験
Trial of Deities
Kamigami no Jikken
episode.summary: Overcoming trials and tribulations, Shinemon gets his rematch against Esuka. Facing the youthful, immature, and reckless Shinemon, Esuka speaks of her own life experience. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 本当にやりたいこと
True Passion
Hontou ni Yaritai Koto
episode.summary: Esuka corners Shinemon into choosing between a life as a fighter or a shop manager. What will Shinemon answer, now that he has learnt and understood it all? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 受験生のメリークリスマス
Examinees` Merry Christmas
Jukensei no Merry Christmas
episode.summary: Shinemon studies for his entrance examination despite the Christmas season. However, the business of Card Capital is booming thanks to the presence of a super popular idol, Hitomi Kouzouji!? What will happen to his studies!? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヴァンガ異変 新右衛門ファイト大図鑑
Vanguard Abnormality - Shinemon Fight Encyclopedia
VanGua Ihen: Shinemon Fight Dai Zukan
episode.summary: A Card Capital with a prosperous future. The famous talent and entrepreneur, Esuka Hibino, and her Shop Manager acquaintance, Shin, shares about the unknowns of Esuka to the regulars. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ギアクロニクル
Gear Chronicle
Gear Chronicle
episode.summary: Shinemon is now a 4th-year university student. He`s supposed to enter the deciding match with his teammates as representatives of Japan, but Rive starts using a new deck with a clan he has never seen before in the tournament. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 召喚実験
Summoning Experiment
Shoukan Jikken
episode.summary: The one who greets Shinemon and friends from mysterious research laboratory "Ryuzu`s Lab" is none other than Tatsuya. Shinemon challenges the head of the lab Ryuzu Myoujin to a fight, and bears witness to a shocking experiment. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: その前日
The Day Before
Sono Zenjitsu
episode.summary: It`s the day before the finals of the Asia Circuit. As Shinemon ponders about whether to join the "Unit Summoning Experiment" or "Team`s Final Worlds Challenge", Esuka invites him for dinner. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 師弟激突
Clash Between Master and Student
Shitei Gekitotsu
episode.summary: Shinemon heads to Ryuzu`s Lab to bring Rive back together with Esuka. Mark enters the finals alone, believing in the return of Shinemon and friends. The curtain rises on Shinemon`s final fight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 本当の相手
The Real Opponent
Hontou no Aite
episode.summary: Ryuzu attempts to involve Shinemon in the summoning experiment. Esuka fights Ryuzu to stop that from happening, and to send Shinemon and his friends to the tournament. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 弓ヶ岳の夜
The Night at Yumigatake
Yumioridake no Yoru
episode.summary: "The one who wants to fight Shinemon with the Unit summoning experiment is not Ryuzu but me.", Tatsuya chuckled dubiously. What does that actually mean? Ryuzu and Rive look back upon the beginning of this research. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 特装天機[アークエイダー]マルクトメレク
Arch-aider Malkuth-melekh
Arcader Mark Tomereku
episode.summary: With a wish "to save the lives of the deceased parents", Tatsuya challenges Ryuzu with the position of the leader for the experiments on the line. He knows the truth behind the experiments that Ryuzu has yet to realize. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ユニット現出!!
Manifest the Units!!
Unit Genshutsu!!
episode.summary: Tatsuya rides on the wings of Malkuth-melekh with his insane desires. To save the hostage Chrono, and to return with Rive to battle alongisde Mark, Shinemon challenges Tatsuya to a final battle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オレたちの翼
Our Wings
Oretachi no Tsubasa
episode.summary: The final battle begins at Ryuzu`s Lab in the midst of the experiment to bridge Earth and Cray during the half-moon. Can Shinemon stop Tatsuya, who has sacrificed everything for the experiment? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ふたたび, キャピタルへ
Once Again, to Capital
Futatabi, Capital e
episode.summary: 10 years have passed after the night of the half-moon. The young Misaki is now a university student, and Shinemon gets used to being "Shin", the shop manager of Card Capital. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新たなる先導者
A New Vanguard
Arata naru Sentousha
episode.summary: With the unexpected reunion, "Shin" brings back "Shinemon" from 10 years ago for the fight. The fight to lead Shinemon`s new future begins... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カードファイト!! ヴァンガード クライマックス直前SP
Episode S3
Card Fight!! Vanguard: Climax Chokuzen SP
3人のアイドル? / 新田シン
Vanguard Abnormality: Shinemon Encyclopedia - Three Idols? / Shin Nitta
3 Nin no Idol? / Shinden Shin
episode.summary: The story of Shinemon that spans two generations...... is supposed to have ended, but both Shinemon and Shin appears!? Shinemon and Shin reminisce about their individual pasts. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヴァンガード 春のヴァン祭り ヴァンガード芸人オーディション前編
Episode S4
Vanguard: Haru no Van Matsuri - Vanguard Geinin Audition Zenpen
ヴァンガード 春のヴァン祭り 第2弾 ヴァンガード芸人オーディション後編
Episode S5
Vanguard: Haru no Van Matsuri - Dai 2 Dan - Vanguard Geinin Audition Kouhen
